quote: The most important thing in communication is to hear what isn't being said. – Peter Drucker
fact: Studies have shown that children laugh an average of 300 times/day and adults 17 times/day, making the average child more optimistic, curious, and creative than the adult.
joke: Did you hear about the bread factory burning down? They say the business is toast.
